member.name: T:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration
member.summary: Plugin configuration for export selections and options.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with defaults.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.ExportDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the export directory for generated JSON files. If empty, a default under the Jellyfin data path is used.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.IncludeUsers
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to export users (via REST) limited to selected users.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.IncludeUserPasswordHashes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to include password hashes from the database for selected users.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.IncludeLibraries
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to export libraries (via REST) limited to selected libraries.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.IncludePermissions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to export user permissions (via REST) for selected users/libraries.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.IncludeWatchHistory
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to export watch history (via IUserDataManager) filtered by selected users/libraries.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.IncludeDevices
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to export devices (from SQLite) filtered by selected users.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.SelectedUserIds
member.summary: Gets or sets selected user IDs (for REST filtering).

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.SelectedUsernames
member.summary: Gets or sets selected usernames (for filtering).

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.SelectedLibraryIds
member.summary: Gets or sets selected library IDs (for REST filtering).

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.SelectedLibraryPaths
member.summary: Gets or sets selected library paths (used for filtering of watched history).

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.LastExportLog
member.summary: Gets or sets the last export log text (short diagnostic shown on the config page).

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.LastExportPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path of the last export directory.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.LastExportUtc
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC timestamp of the last export completion.

member.name: T:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Export.ExportLogger
member.summary: Handles logging for export operations.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Export.ExportLogger.Log(System.String)
member.summary: Logs a message with timestamp.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Export.ExportLogger.LogError(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Logs an error message with optional exception.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Export.ExportLogger.GetFullLog
member.summary: Gets the complete log as a string.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Export.ExportLogger.SaveLogToFileAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the log to a file in the export directory.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Export.ExportLogger.SaveToConfiguration(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the log to the plugin configuration.

member.name: T:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Export.ExportMigrationTask
member.summary: A scheduled task to run the migration export.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Export.ExportService
member.summary: Simplified export service that coordinates user export operations.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: User manager for accessing user data.
Library manager for accessing library data.
User view manager for accessing user libraries.
User data manager for retrieving per-user item data.

member.summary: Runs the simplified export workflow.
member.returns: A task representing the export operation.

member.summary: Handles user data export operations.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: User manager for accessing user data.
Library manager for accessing library data.
User view manager for accessing user libraries.

member.summary: Exports user data to the specified output path.

member.summary: Exports per-user watch history to separate JSON files.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Export.WatchHistoryExporter.ExportPerUserAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Export per-user watch history into the specified directory.
member.param: Optional list of user IDs to include (N-format guids or with dashes).
member.returns: The number of user files written.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Plugin.Template.Export.WatchHistoryExporter.BuildAndExecuteWatchedQueryAsync(Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnection,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Detects a compatible user-data schema and executes a normalized select reader.
member.returns: Reader with columns: UserId, ItemId, Played, PlayCount, IsFavorite, PlaybackPositionTicks, LastPlayedDate.
